info.description: The Bill Payment Validator service allows RPPS origination (payment sender) customers to identify if a potential RPPS transaction would process successfully before transmitting the formal payment transaction, reducing RPPS payment rejects and costly payment processing exceptions.
info.title: Bill Payment Validator

post.description: Bill Payment Validator performs real time transaction validation against the specified Biller ID's account masks, account check digits and all other registered RPPS processing parameters.

requestBody.description: Contains the details of the get PAR API request message.

post.summary: Bill Payment Validator service returns the processing status for a potential RPPS transaction

AccountNumber.description: Consumer account number populated in the message.  The minimum length is 8 and the maximum length is 22.

BillerId.description: Biller ID populated in the message. The maximum length is 10.

CustomerIdentifier1.description: Consumer identifier populated in the message.

CustomerIdentifier2.description: Consumer identifier populated in the message.

CustomerIdentifier3.description: Consumer identifier populated in the message.

CustomerIdentifier4.description: Consumer identifier populated in the message.

ResponseString.description: Indicates if the bill payment transaction information passed all RPPS transaction processing edits for the specified biller ID or indicates errors. The minimum length is 0 and the maximum length is 120.

RppsId.description: Originator RPPS ID populated in the message.  The maximum length is 8.

ReasonCode.description: This will identify the reason for the error.

Source.description: This is the unique identifier that attempts to define the field in error when available.  If a specific field can't be identified System will be returned.
